user_query: I want to surprise my friends with a personalized playlist for their wedding. Help me find the basic information of a specific song on Soundcloud and suggest a playlist and an artist from Deezer that resonate with their love story.

TaskList.description: Retrieve basic information of the specified song on Soundcloud.
Analyze the love story to determine themes and preferences.
Suggest a playlist based on the themes identified in the love story from Deezer.
Recommend an artist from Deezer that aligns with the love story themes.
